content:
But, um... this inspiration kinda took me by surprise!
I was actually looking for ideas for a plushie.
info: 偶遇玩法-发创想卡-模板-12绵朵莉_送创想卡

content: {A开心}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, when you came by, it felt like... inspiration itself — so floofalicious, and just right~!

content: In the end, I didn't get any plushie ideas at all. Instead...{A灵光一现} I somehow... made a piece of furniture. And now that you're here, maybe... it's meant for you!
info: 偶遇玩法-发创想卡-模板-12绵朵莉_送创想卡

content: I packed the furniture I made into this box! {A笑眯眯}It's for you!

content: I should go look for more inspiration. <style=SizeSmall>Oh dear, all these furniture ideas keep floating into my head... please stop... meh?</style>
